00025 #include "OgrePlatformManager.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreDynLibManager.h"
00028 #include "OgreDynLib.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     template<> PlatformManager* Singleton<PlatformManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     PlatformManager::PlatformManager()
00036     {
00037         // Load library
00038         String libraryName = "OgrePlatform.";
00039         #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_WIN32
00040             libraryName += "dll";
00041         #else
00042             libraryName += "so";
00043         #endif
00044 
00045         DynLib* lib = DynLibManager::getSingleton().load(libraryName);
00046 
00047         mpfCreateConfigDialog = (DLL_CREATECONFIGDIALOG)lib->getSymbol("createPlatformConfigDialog");
00048         mpfCreateErrorDialog = (DLL_CREATEERRORDIALOG)lib->getSymbol("createPlatformErrorDialog");
00049         mpfCreateInputReader = (DLL_CREATEINPUTREADER)lib->getSymbol("createPlatformInputReader");
00050 
00051         mpfDestroyConfigDialog = (DLL_DESTROYCONFIGDIALOG)lib->getSymbol("destroyPlatformConfigDialog");
00052         mpfDestroyErrorDialog = (DLL_DESTROYERRORDIALOG)lib->getSymbol("destroyPlatformErrorDialog");
00053         mpfDestroyInputReader = (DLL_DESTROYINPUTREADER)lib->getSymbol("destroyPlatformInputReader");
00054 
00055     }
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     ConfigDialog* PlatformManager::createConfigDialog()
00058     {
00059         // Delegate
00060         ConfigDialog* pdlg;
00061         mpfCreateConfigDialog(&pdlg);
00062         return pdlg;
00063     }
00064     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     ErrorDialog* PlatformManager::createErrorDialog()
00066     {
00067         // Delegate
00068         ErrorDialog* pdlg;
00069         mpfCreateErrorDialog(&pdlg);
00070         return pdlg;
00071     }
00072     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     InputReader* PlatformManager::createInputReader()
00074     {
00075         // Delegate
00076         InputReader* pinput;
00077         mpfCreateInputReader(&pinput);
00078         return pinput;
00079     }
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     void PlatformManager::destroyConfigDialog(ConfigDialog*  dlg)
00082     {
00083         // Delegate
00084         mpfDestroyConfigDialog(dlg);
00085     }
00086     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087     void PlatformManager::destroyErrorDialog(ErrorDialog* dlg)
00088     {
00089         // Delegate
00090         mpfDestroyErrorDialog(dlg);
00091     }
00092     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     void PlatformManager::destroyInputReader(InputReader* reader)
00094     {
00095         // Delegate
00096         mpfDestroyInputReader(reader);
00097     }
00098     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00099     PlatformManager& PlatformManager::getSingleton(void)
00100     {
00101         return Singleton<PlatformManager>::getSingleton();
00102     }
00103
